title: Info on the Bookman Typeface
content: Hey I need some really indepth info on the [Bookman](http://web.archive.org/web/20120905145912/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bookman) typeface. Anything really; It's origins, history, any posters it's been used on, any quirky facts etc. I've searched on the net but can't find anything other than the basics. Any books you recommend looking at as well? Thanks for any help.
author: RisingSun

comments.content: can you get your hnds on the book _[American Metal Typefaces of the Twentieth Century](http://web.archive.org/web/20120905145912/http:/typophile.com/wiki/American%20Metal%20Typefaces%20of%20the%20Twentieth%20Century)_ its great for that, theres a full page of type on him. and a nics spec sheet.

Also, _[Anatomy of a Typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20120905145912/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Anatomy%20of%20a%20Typeface)_ has a full chapter devoted to the history of Bookman.

p.s. i put a wikilink to [Bookman](http://web.archive.org/web/20120905145912/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bookman) in your initial post and started a bit of an article there for you to reference.

p.p.s. another good reference is _[The Encyclopaedia of Type Faces](http://web.archive.org/web/20120905145912/http:/typophile.com/wiki/The%20Encyclopaedia%20of%20Type%20Faces)_
